CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: ion charge slug
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Designed to combat mechanoids, the round creates an electrical current on impact, disrupting electronic systems temporarily.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: ion charge buck
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Designed to combat mechanoids, the round creates an electrical current on impact, disrupting electronic systems temporarily.
